articles.title: Women’s health: How to prepare yourself for menopause - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: From eating to exercise and identifying the symptoms, here’s everything you need to know about preparing for an easier transition towards the next phase of your life, in this next instalment of CNA Women’s series on menopause.
articles.content:
In order to know if you might be perimenopausal, Dr Lim suggested looking beyond irregular periods per se, and taking note of your cycles duration and even the character of the menses. 
For example,… [+1146 chars]

articles.author: Ritayan Basu
articles.title: Badminton Asia Championships: Satwiksairaj Rankireddy-Chirag Shetty Make History, Win Gold in Final - News18
articles.description: Satwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty defeated Ong Yew Sin and Teo Ee Yi 16-21, 21-17, 21-19 in the men's doubles final to win gold at the Badminton Asia Championships
articles.content: Indias top mens doubles pair Satwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty won gold after beating the Malaysian pair of Ong Yew Sin and Teo Ee Yi 16-21, 21-17, 21-19 in the final at the Badminton Asia Ch… [+4529 chars]
